example.eg: It was Jane's custom to go jogging every morning before breakfast.
example.egtrans: 简喜欢每天早餐前晨跑。

example.eg: The custom is to bring a gift when you are invited to dinner.
example.egtrans: 这个习俗就是受邀赴宴时要记得带份礼物。

example.eg: "Thank you for your custom," the shop owner said.
Tired of exorbitant fees, Rachel decided to take her custom to another bank.
example.egtrans: 受够了高额的资费，蕾切尔决定更换一家银行。

example.eg: After passport control, you need to pass through customs.
example.egtrans: 经过护照检查处后，您还需要通过海关检查。

example.eg: You may have to pay customs on imported goods.
example.egtrans: 你可能须要为进口商品交关税。

example.eg: Canadian customs charge you taxes for any imported goods valued over $20.
example.egtrans: 加拿大海关向所有价值超过20美元的进口商品征收关税。

example.eg: Customs is holding the shipment till you pay the tax.
example.egtrans: 在缴纳税费之前，海关会扣下你的货物。

example.eg: The company had to pay the customs duty for the imported item.
example.egtrans: 公司必须为进口物品缴关税。

example.eg: The company built a custom motorcycle for him.
example.egtrans: 公司为他定制了一辆摩托车。

example.eg: The adverts generated a lot of custom.
According to custom, the dinner must be on the first Sunday in June.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 根据习俗, 根据风俗习惯

example.eg: A custom-designed computer would have only the components the buyer desires.
The motorcyclists admired all the custom work on the bikes parked outside the bar.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 定做的活儿, 定做的东西
个性化的服务, 定制的服务

example.eg: Those bookcases are custom-fitted to go in that niche in the living room.
The millionaire wore only custom-made suits.
example.egtrans: 这位百万富翁只穿定制套装。//他的办公家具都是定做的。

example.eg: The sales assistants were so rude to me, I decided to take my custom elsewhere.
